Description: Senior at Bennington College (VT, US). Passionate about Sound Design, Composing, and Game Programming.

AboutContent: My professional experience varies from music education to audio engineering & recording, foley & sound design, composing for films, and game development. I am a very curious person, and I am constantly in search of new concepts and ideas that bring inspiration to my inter-disciplinary work.
